data.meanings: to come/do, commit, (with preposition bi) to bring, produce, (2:275) to receive
data.sentence: The word جَاءَهُمْ comes from the root ج ي ا and is associated with the meanings: to come/do, commit, (with preposition bi) to bring, produce, (2:275) to receive

data.meanings: to wonder, menstruate, rejoice, inspire with awe, ridicule, laugh at, laugh, become clear.
data.sentence: The word يَضْحَكُونَ comes from the root ض ح ك and is associated with the meanings: to wonder, menstruate, rejoice, inspire with awe, ridicule, laugh at, laugh, become clear.
